issue.title: Bump lodash from 4.17.11 to 4.17.15

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

issue.body:
Bumps [lodash](https://github.com/lodash/lodash) from 4.17.11 to 4.17.15.
Commits - [`ddfd9b1`](https://github.com/lodash/lodash/commit/ddfd9b11a0126db2302cb70ec9973b66baec0975) Bump to v4.17.15. - [`b185fce`](https://github.com/lodash/lodash/commit/b185fcee26b2133bd071f4aaca14b455c2ed1008) Rebuild lodash and docs. - [`be87d30`](https://github.com/lodash/lodash/commit/be87d303941222b97c482755afc0f4a77ce46c30) Bump to v4.17.14. - [`a6fe6b1`](https://github.com/lodash/lodash/commit/a6fe6b1e174fd02b5e60eb2664405f4c1262c300) Rebuild lodash and docs. - [`e371828`](https://github.com/lodash/lodash/commit/e37182845f16715a0d1c391c8662d83c55609cee) Bump to v4.17.13. - [`357e899`](https://github.com/lodash/lodash/commit/357e899e685872b4af5403ecc4b2a928f961ae63) Rebuild lodash and docs. - [`fd9a062`](https://github.com/lodash/lodash/commit/fd9a062d57646450b61f74029315abd4cc834b08) Bump to v4.17.12. - [`e77d681`](https://github.com/lodash/lodash/commit/e77d68121ff00ba86b53eed5893d35adfe94c9dd) Rebuild lodash and docs. - [`629d186`](https://github.com/lodash/lodash/commit/629d1865793182cd967196716f4beff223aa4a91) Update OpenJS references. - [`2406eac`](https://github.com/lodash/lodash/commit/2406eac542b2a1282be8d812a6d8a45433ade80a) Fix minified build. - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/lodash/lodash/compare/4.17.11...4.17.15)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=lodash&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=4.17.11&new-version=4.17.15)](https://help.github.com/articles/configuring-automated-security-fixes) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot ignore this [patch|minor|major] version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor/major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot use these labels` will set the current labels as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use these reviewers` will set the current reviewers as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use these assignees` will set the current assignees as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use this milestone` will set the current milestone as the default for future PRs for this repo and language You can disable automated security fix PRs for this repo from the [Security Alerts page](https://github.com/cryptocracy/remark/network/alerts).

issue.title: Feature Request: Customized Channels

milestone.title: April Sprint to MVP
milestone.description: Things to get done ideally before the end of April

issue.body:
Each channel owner needs to have the ability to set 2 additional custom properties:
- [x] add a custom header Image for their channel.
- [x] add a custom short description to the channel.
- [x] add a list of the channels associated `my_sounds.json` under the row of buttons

Note: Play now and add to playlist should work just like the other audio listings (reference SoundInfo.vue or Quorum.vue)

issue.title: Feature Request: Suggest Channels to Subscribe to

milestone.title: April Sprint to MVP
milestone.description: Things to get done ideally before the end of April

issue.body:
While at:  `/` (latest)
While at: `/popular`
While at:  `/subscribed-channels`

- [ ] We need to have a module on right hand side. that suggest new channels to follow. 
(derived from get from cryptocracy search services at `/remark/channels/suggested`)

Should look similar to how Debut looks would be great. (note view all could ref `/remark/channels` )
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5354826/56834837-66401600-6827-11e9-90d8-49f2f048f3ad.png)

issue.title: Merge Like and Upvote onclick

milestone.title: May Sprint to MVP
milestone.description: Things to complete by the end of May Sprint

issue.body:
In preps for #4 for Monetization of the like, we need to probably first merge the Like and Upvote functionality into a single onclick.

Need to also bind this to the Popular pages Like icon/buttons onclick.

Then after we can merge the tip functionality to it once the dependencies for it are also in place.

issue.title: Feature Request: Customized Channels

milestone.title: April Sprint to MVP
milestone.description: Things to get done ideally before the end of April

issue.body:
Each channel owner needs to have the ability to set 2 additional custom properties:
- [x] add a custom header Image for their channel.
- [x] add a custom short description to the channel.
- [x] add a list of the channels associated `my_sounds.json` under the row of buttons

Note: Play now and add to playlist should work just like the other audio listings (reference SoundInfo.vue or Quorum.vue)

Feature Request: Record Audio Directly to Add New

milestone.title: May Sprint to MVP
milestone.description: Things to complete by the end of May Sprint

issue.body: Rig up api access to the users Mic to enable recording audio directly from teh app, passing them to the add  `/sounds/add-sound` form upon audio file being created with the new file already selected.

issue.title: Feature Request: Sound object update

milestone.title: May Sprint to MVP
milestone.description: Things to complete by the end of May Sprint

issue.body:
To help improve the UX and UI we need to add the follow new properties to the sound object model.

- [ ] new field for new Thumbnail Image per sound. (to give a little bit of eye candy to the listener as they discover content.) 

- [ ] if the description contains URL(s), we need to make them actual hyperlinks that opens in a new window, to give content creators the ability to give the listeners something to goto that may be of relative interest.
